content: the hook insert the hook in the stitches to the left and right of the one with the chains yarn over and pull through to make a slip stich from now on work through both the front and back stitches to close the foot 2 sl chain 2 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 3 sl 2 chain 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook finnish off in the last remaining stich and work away the ends fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 6 fold the foot in half with the loop in the chain two right corner make a single_crochet into the second chain insert the hook in the stitches to the left from the hook and right of the one with the chains yarn over and pull through both stitches as make two more slip stitches through both well as the loop already on the hook to the front and back stitches before chaining make a slip_stitch two to start the next toe fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 7 back legs make two using yarn color a row 1 make 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 row 20 single_crochet in st each around finish off and leave a long tail 6 row 2-19 single_crochet in st each around 6 front legs make two using yarn color a row 1 make 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 row 2-4 single_crochet in st each around 6 row 5 6 single_crochet finish off and leave a long tail 6 hat option 1 pointy hat make using yarn color e row 1 make 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 row 12 single_crochet in st each around 21 row 2 *1 single_crochet 1 increase* 2 times 6 row 13 *6 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 24 row 3 single_crochet in st each around 6 row 14 23 single_crochet 1 sl 24 row 4 *1 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 9 row 15 work all stitches in this round only in the front loops *3 single_crochet 1 row 5 *2 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 12 increase* 6 times 30 row 6 single_crochet in st each around 12 row 16 *4 single_crochet 1 increase* 6 times 36 row 7 *3 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 15 row 17 *5 single_crochet 1 increase* 6 times 42 row 8 single_crochet in st each around 15 row 18 3 single_crochet * 1 increase 6 single_crochet* 5 times 1 increase 3 row 9 *4 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 18 single_crochet 48 row 10 single_crochet in st each around 18 row 19 2 sl finish off weave away the tail row 11 *5 single_crochet 1 increase* 3 times 21 fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 8 lightly stuff the hat hat band make one using yarn color c chain 24 sl into the first chain make sure the chain is not twisted chain 1 single_crochet in each chain around sl into the first single_crochet and finish off with a long tail sew the hat
